title: Chorizo and tomato spaghetti
ingredients: ['olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 handul finely diced chorizo', 'good glug white wine', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 pinch dried oregano', 'good pinch paprika', 'seasoning', 'squirt of tomato puree', '1 vine ripened tomato, chopped', 'spaghetti, to serve', 'grated Parmesan cheese, to serve']
